original_text: I want to ask you one more thing. Please prepare a room in your home where I can stay. I know that all of you are praying for God to let me go free. As a result, I hope that I will be able to visit you again.
korean_text: 오직 너는 나를 위하여 숙소를 마련하라 너희 기도로 내가 너희에게 나아갈 수 있기를 바라노라

sentences.original_text: I want to ask you one more thing.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신에게 한 가지 더 묻고 싶습니다.

sentences.original_text: Please prepare a room in your home
I know that all of you are praying
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신 모두가 기도하고 있다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: for God to let me go free.
I hope that I will be able to visit you again.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신을 다시 방문할 수 있기를 바랍니다.
